name: Grave Peril
description:
Arrow keys to move / dig, or tap on mobile.

Use the door at ground level to skip further down the map if desired. Enemies will be much faster, you should start from the top the first few times.

A lot of art is placeholder.

The red chest wheel spin isn't complete. It used to unlock better digging tools but I like giving the player the best one-hit shovel from the beginning.

Let me know what you think!
